item.title: Palestinians flee Khan Younis as Israeli forces strike south Gaza - BBC.com
item.description:
1. Palestinians flee Khan Younis as Israeli forces strike south Gaza  BBC.com
  2. Israel orders new evacuations in southern Gaza, prompting transfer of hospital patients  CNN
  3. Desperate Gazans sleep outside after new Israeli evacuation order  Yahoo! Voices
  4. Israel orders Palestinians to evacuate parts of Khan Younis once again  The Washington Post
  5. The Latest | Overnight strike kills 9 in Khan Younis, hours after Israel ordered a mass evacuation  The Associated Press

item.title: At least 200 candidates withdraw before second round of voting – France election live
item.description:
More than 110 are members of left-wing New Popular Front with more than 70 from Macron camp

The National Rally’s Jordan Bardella is debating on social media with France’s economy minister, Bruno Le Maire, about the far right’s plan to scrap nationality rights for children born and raised in France by foreign parents.

Gabriel Attal, the prime minister and a Macron ally, said that “from the first round, we made the choice in more than sixty constituencies not to present a candidate.”

Continue reading...

item.title: Second Reform candidate quits, accusing party of ‘racism and misogyny’
item.description:
Georgie David, who was Reform’s candidate for West Ham and Beckton, accuses party of failing to tackle problems

  • UK election live – latest updates

A second Reform UK candidate has quit the hard-right party, alleging that the vast majority of those standing for it in the general election are “racist, misogynistic and bigoted”.

Georgie David, who had been Reform’s candidate for West Ham and Beckton, issued a statement through the Conservatives, the party she is now backing.

Continue reading...
